message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Take this as a good start, but if you want more, you'll have to fight for it.
Alice, that was quite greedy.  I'm feeling the effects of inflation already. Let's be reasonable - this offer leaves us both with a good chunk.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. Let's split the difference and call it a day.  We both lose money with every round, and I don't want to risk it all.
